command.me.desc: View your current guild`s star level, broken star, online time and other information
command.other.desc: View the star level, broken star, online time and other information of other current guild members
command.other.user.desc: To query target members, you can use @ to quickly specify the user
command.lottery.desc: By betting broken stars in the lottery, you have a chance to get more
command.get_verification.desc: Enter the email address to obtain the verification code
command.verify.desc: Used to enter the verification code obtained from email
command.music.music.desc: Music name or music URL (youtube only)
command.disconnect.desc: Exit the voice channel and initialize the music list
command.rank.desc: Rankings of members of this guild
command.rank.index.desc: The ranking index value determines how many rankings are returned

content.me.is_personal: This command cannot be used in personal messages
content.other.is_personal: This command cannot be used in personal messages
content.verify.sent: The verification code has been sent, please check your email
